original_text: Thou shalt also take thereof a few in number, and bind them in thy skirts.
korean_text: 너는 터럭 중에서 조금을 네 옷자락에 싸고

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt also take thereof a few in number,
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 너는 그것 중에서 수가 적은 것들을 취하고,

sentences.original_text: and bind them in thy skirts.
